title: COVID-19 Critical Care Nursing Education: Case-Based Training Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and foundational infection control principles
context.additional_context: Case-based education in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, focusing on COVID-19 critical patient management scenarios in ICUs and general wards

learning_goals: Explanation of clinical symptoms and severity assessment criteria for severe COVID-19 patients with 80% accuracy
Application of infection control protocols in ICUs and general wards based on real-world case studies
Performance of respiratory support device management and emergency response procedures through simulation case studies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
